category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA101_num_of_items_to_save_per_call
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to limit the number of items to be created or updated through a single SOA call. If the number of items involved in a single save operation exceeds the number specified in this option, multiple SOA calls will be performed. See TCAA Installation Guide for details. Possible values: - 0 or any negative number: all the items involved in the save operation are created or updated with a single SOA call. - Any positive number: each SOA call for creating or updating items will involve at most the specified number of items. The default value is: 1000.
